channel.title: Iptable on Just a Memo

item.title: Linux_Server
item.description: iptables (https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-list-and-delete-iptables-firewall-rules) List Chains with number bash sudo iptables -L -n -v --line-numbers Delete Chains bash sudo iptables -D INPUT 7
